DOC.brief_summary: This study assess safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics single-dose odanacatib ( MK0822 ) without food .
DOC.brief_title: A Single-Dose Study Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics Odanacatib ( MK0822 ) Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Subject good health Subject male age 18 45 year ( Part I ) female 60 year young Female subject postmenopausal Subject within 20 % ideal body weight Subject nonsmoker Subject multiple severe allergy food medication Subject history metabolic bone disease , kidney/bladder stone , treatment bisphosphonates Subject infection , include HIV Subject consume excessive amount caffeine alcohol Subject donate blood take another investigational drug last month Subject history illness may confound result study pose additional risk administer study drug
